alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Northumberland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 6:25PM EDT until July 03 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR EASTERN NORTHUMBERLAND AND CENTRAL LANCASTER COUNTIES... At 625 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lancaster, or near Kilmarnock, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Wicomico Church around 640 PM EDT. Fair Port around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Browns Store, Regina, Mollusk, Alfonso, Avalon, Brook Vale, Reedville, Lilian, Hull Neck and Edwardsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
